com.teragrep.pth_06

Class TeragrepDatasource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teragrep.pth_06.TeragrepDatasource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.spark.sql.connector.catalog.SupportsRead, org.apache.spark.sql.connector.catalog.Table, org.apache.spark.sql.connector.catalog.TableProvider, org.apache.spark.sql.sources.DataSourceRegister

    public final class TeragrepDatasource
extends Object
implements org.apache.spark.sql.sources.DataSourceRegister, org.apache.spark.sql.connector.catalog.TableProvider, org.apache.spark.sql.connector.catalog.Table, org.apache.spark.sql.connector.catalog.SupportsRead

    TeragrepDatasource

    Class that represents the custom Teragrep Spark Datasource. It reports the capabilities of the datasource, its name, the schema and initializes the micro stream.
    Since:
    10/10/2023
    Author:
    Mikko Kortelainen, Eemeli Hukka
    See Also:
    DataSourceRegister, TableProvider, Table, SupportsRead
